name: mapdcl2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crn(c0), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crn(c0), c2))

stmt.pretty: mapdcl(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(c0)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clh, c4))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(cmpd, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(cfv(cdvh, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(clss, c6))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c4, chlt), wcel(c5, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(crn(c0), c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clh, c4))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(cmpd, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(cfv(cdvh, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(clss, c6))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c4, chlt), wcel(c5, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))

stmt.origin: mapdrn2(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c8, w0)
stmt.pretty: mapdrn2(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c8, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(crn(c0), c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clh, c4))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(cmpd, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c8, cfv(cfv(clcd, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c8))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c4, chlt), wcel(c5, c3)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → ran(c0)= c2)
⊣ c3 =(LHyp ` c4)
⊣ c0 =((mapd ` c4)` c5)
⊣ c8 =((LCDual ` c4)` c5)
⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c8)
⊣ (w0 →(c4 ∈ HL ∧ c5 ∈ c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(clh, c4))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(cmpd, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(cfv(cdvh, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c7, cfv(clss, c6))
-| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c4, chlt), wcel(c5, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c7))
-| wceq(c8, cfv(cfv(clcd, c4), c5))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c8))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈ c2)
⊣ c3 =(LHyp ` c4)
⊣ c0 =((mapd ` c4)` c5)
⊣ c6 =((DVecH ` c4)` c5)
⊣ c7 =(LSubSp ` c6)
⊣ (w0 →(c4 ∈ HL ∧ c5 ∈ c3))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c7)
⊣ c8 =((LCDual ` c4)` c5)
⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c8)

comment: The mapping of a subspace of vector space H is a subspace in the dual space of functionals with closed kernels. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jan-2015.)
